# localIdentifier

**Instance Property**

A unique string that persistently identifies the object.

## Declaration

```swift
var localIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this string to find the object by using the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAsset/fetchAssets(withLocalIdentifiers:options:)], [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollection/fetchAssetCollections(withLocalIdentifiers:options:)], or [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/fetchCollectionLists(withLocalIdentifiers:options:)] method.
title: localIdentifier
